review.title: “Bad Company”
review.pros: Pros – Start with good hourly salary.
review.cons: Cons – Bad management and they force employee to make success calls (sale type). They scare employee to lose their jobs when they are not making any success calls... Very unprofessional!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get some education and learn to be professional and sensitive to others. You only focus on making money for your company and you don't care about your employees.
